subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS, Jan. 28 (AP) — Oscar De La Hoya has still not hired a trainer for his May 5 super-welterweight bout with Floyd Mayweather Jr.
snippet: LAS VEGAS, Jan. 28 (AP) — Oscar De La Hoya has still not hired a trainer for his May 5 super-welterweight bout with Floyd Mayweather Jr.
